actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend clause 32(c) of rule XI of the House of Representatives to provide the minority party, upon request, with up to one-third of a committee's investigative staff funds.

summary.text: Provides the minority party in the House of Representatives, upon request of a majority of its members on any standing committee, with up to one-third of a committee's investigative staff funds rather than simply providing for fair consideration of the minority in such funding.

titles.title: Resolution to amend clause 32(c) of rule XI of the House of Representatives to provide the minority party, upon request, with up to one-third of a committee's investigative staff funds.
